io.sarl.sre.services.executor

Class VerboseThreadExecutorPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.sarl.sre.services.executor.AbstractThreadExecutorPolicy
      • io.sarl.sre.services.executor.AbstractLoggingThreadExecutorPolicy
        • io.sarl.sre.services.executor.VerboseThreadExecutorPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler, RejectedExecutionHandler

    @Singleton
public class VerboseThreadExecutorPolicy
extends AbstractLoggingThreadExecutorPolicy
    A handler for rejected tasks and uncaught exceptions that logs a warning on the platform logger when a task is rejected, and an error for each uncaught exception.
    Version:
    0.11.0 2020-05-31 12:31:25
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    See Also:
    ThreadPoolExecutor.CallerRunsPolicy}
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin
